title: "For sale" or "For rent” signs for real estate, not exceeding 2 sq
clause_text: "For sale" or "For rent” signs for real estate, not exceeding 2 sq. m in area provided they are located on the premises offered for sale or rent.

source_pdf.text_snippet: "For sale" or "For rent” signs for real estate, not exceeding 2 sq. m in area provided they are located on the premises offered for sale or rent.
